interestingFact: Nepal is the home of Mount Everest, the tallest mountain in the world.
India has the world's largest democracy and is known for the Taj Mahal.
Japan is famous for its cherry blossoms and advanced technology.
Australia is home to the Great Barrier Reef, the largest coral reef system in the world.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest tropical rainforest in the world.
Egypt is famous for the ancient pyramids and the Sphinx.
Canada has the longest coastline in the world.
France is the most visited country in the world, known for the Eiffel Tower.
